constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: CONARA Name: Fairfield/Knights Park Conservation Area
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Housing HRA

description: Erection of two storey side and rear extension in association with the conversion of property from 2 no. self-contained flats into 4 no. self-contained flats (3 x one-bedroom and 1 x studio), with associated refuse and cycle stores
decision_conditions: The proposed development would result in direct overlooking of the neighbouring occupiers and would result in a loss of privacy that would be detrimental to and diminish the existing living conditions of the neighbouring occupiers. The proposal therefore would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.

The applicantion is not supported by an Aboricultural method statement and Tree Protection Plan and as such the applicant has failed to demonstrate that the proposed development would not cause damage or loss of the adjacent trees subject of Tree Preservation Orders which would cause less than substantial harm to the character and appearance of the surrounding area a designated Conservation Area (Knights Park/Fairfield CA). Therefore the proposal would not accord with Section 72 of the Planning(Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, paragraphs 193 - 202 of the NPPF, and policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.
